title: No red posts on the front page.
body: This is it. The final death knell of Riot Games. What few voices there were trying to pr the public with lies are now gone. They don't even bother trying to justify their crap anymore. "oh well, we never listened to the forums anyway, might as well stop pretending we do"

replies.body:
Hey Alaric11,

Sorry you feel like we're not listening. Keep in mind that it's currently the weekend, which means a lot of us are catching up on sleep, or enjoying a bit of time off. :]

You've been quite active on the forums, which a lot of us love, but the number of red posts (especially about design and balance) feels like it has dropped quite a bit. 

It seems like there was a fairly steep drop around the holidays last year (weird, huh?), but the red interaction hasn't really recovered since.

You mad they nerfed some things you liked or something? It's just a game, get over it. You're acting like you're the victim of some heinous crime. LoL is not dying, Riot is not lying, and nobody is going to notice if you leave; but the forums will be more enjoyable if you do.
